name: Sciamachy
description:
Sciamachy is a short roguelike game where you delve into your own mind to conquer your demons. It's a short experience displaying what it's like for someone struggling through their own traumas and issues. If this game is received well then I have plans on expanding the world and stories to better represent the story.

Edit: There's a game breaking bug in the boss room where you can't see his projectile attacks that shoot out
